title: add review comment to sb files
body:
### Context

Contributes to https://github.com/dotnet/source-build/issues/3435

Adds comments to source-build files asking for the inclusion of the source-build team in PRs that alter `SourceBuild*` files. Non-reviewed changes could potentially cause issues down the line, be it in the downstream repos or the product build (as has happened in the past, see https://github.com/dotnet/source-build/issues/3435#issuecomment-1570650046)

### Changes Made

  - added comments to source-build files asking for the inclusion of the source-build team in PRs that alter `SourceBuild*` file.

### Testing


### Notes

commit.message: add review comment to sb files

nodes.body:
> Curious if we shouldn't add the `CODEOWNERS` file to enforce such rules.

From past experience `CODEOWNERS` is a useful tool, but if you are tagging a team alias it will need to have write access to the repo for the entry to work.

Speaking of write access - I don't have it for `msbuild` so I cannot merge this PR myself. Would be great if someone from the maintainers could merge it. Thanks!
